title: UN calls for restraint from all groups
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Resident Coordinator of the United Nations in Sri Lanka, Hanaa Singer states that the United Nations is monitoring the developments in Sri Lanka and are concerned by reports of violence.
Several Embassies also took steps to introduce alerts to foreign visitors in Sri Lanka and to remain vigilant.
Carpenters protest on Galle Road; Heavy police presence in the area
